person.persName: John Beasley (Grant Co/Covington stagecoach driver and military deserter)

body.p: Grant County, and Covington, Kentucky, stagecoach driver. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia Beasley. Father of Minnie Beasley, George Beasley, and John Beasley. Stagecoach driver in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Crittenden, p. 186. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 46. “John Beasley,” Spring Grove Cemetery, http://www.springgrove.org/stats/81975.tif.pdf (accessed January 26, 2017).
